item.title: Reading List
item.description: To explain or to predict? - Galit Shmueli Common statistical tests are linear models (or: how to teach stats), 中文版 因果革命 - 于淼 Combining p-values via averaging - Vladimir Vovk, Ruodu Wang Sensitivity Analysis in Observational Research: Introducing the E-Value How to finish a Ph.D. - Matthias Schonlau 动手学深度学习 [Geometric Representation of High Dimension, Low Sample Size Data] The cancer genome A tutorial on conducting genome‐wide association studies: Quality control and statistical analysis
